commands.name: init
commands.summary: initializes a new dapple project in the current folder

commands.name: install

options.name: [--save]
options.summary: saves the package as a dependency to your dappfile

options.name: [<package> <url-or-version>]
options.summary: package name with specified url or version

commands.summary: install a package from dapphub or any other source

options.name: [-r <RegExp>]
options.summary: filter classes with a regular expression

commands.name: test

options.name: [-r <RegExp>]
options.summary: filter the test classes, you want to run

options.name: [--skip-build]
options.summary: don't recompile your project and take all information from the last build

commands.summary: runs a local testnet with all your tests

options.name: test <class>
options.summary: generates a new test class in your contracts folder

options.name: [--force]
options.summary: owerwrite objects in the current environment

options.name: [--no-simulation]
options.summary: skips local simulation of the deploy and execute the script on the given environment

commands.name: publish
commands.summary: publishes the current project as a package to the registry

options.name: <path>
options.summary: relative path to a file or directory

options.name: <path>
options.summary: relative path to a file or directory

options.name: --optimize
options.summary: sends the optimize flag to solidity during the build process
